snippet.title: HacX: Twitch 'n Kill - Full Playthrough (100%)
snippet.description:
More About HacX Here & Download Links: http://www.drnostromo.com/hacx/
idgames Archive: https://www.doomworld.com/idgames/themes/hacx/

A full playthrough of Hacx: Twitch 'n Kill with all (possible) secrets earned. Unfortunately I just realized I could have enabled "Secret Found" message on the options yet I never did by the time I finished. And given that this was my second playthrough, well I don't have all the time in the world.

Anyways, here is Hacx in its entirety, enjoy. Also if you're wondering why the texture change MAP15, I was doing my second playthrough on PrBoom+ launching Hacx as an IWAD but that resulted in skipping MAP31, so I decided to use Hacx as a PWAD for Doom 2 (with the save file still working thankfully) in order to play MAP31. It's kind of weird but nothing too big of an issue.

MAP01 - 0:00
MAP02 - 15:08
MAP03 - 32:14
MAP04 - 40:37
MAP05 - 49:42
MAP06 - 55:01
MAP07 - 1:07:10
MAP08 - 1:19:06
MAP09 - 1:36:45
MAP10 - 1:44:31
MAP11 - 2:00:15
MAP12 - 2:06:07
MAP13 - 2:30:06
MAP14 - 2:39:21
MAP15 - 2:43:47
MAP31 - 2:54:23
MAP16 - 2:57:22
MAP17 - 2:58:55
MAP18 - 3:06:33
MAP19 - 3:08:01
MAP20 - 3:12:53
